name: Relic of The Past
description:
Made in collaboration with Ben2508

Relic of The Past is a short 2.5D puzzle-adventure game, where you're tasked to explore a newly found Tomb, but then it all goes wrong!

Navigate your way to the exit without suffering a painful death!

Controls:
A-D | Left and Right
E | Interaction

Contributors:
Ben2508 - Main Development
Banana - Graphics and Art + Lil' bit of Development

Enjoy playing!

Made in 48 hours for Alakajam #11
